sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: The TiGL Viewer component shows CPACS geometries during workflow execution.The TiGL Viewer Component is currently only available on Windows operating systems.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The TiGL Viewer component has no properties at all. It only has a preconfigured input channel and a preconfigured output channel “TiGL Viewer File”.
During workflow execution the view “TIGL Viewer” will be opened during the first component run. In the following iterations the geometry shown in the view will be updated with the current input.
